item.title: Pediatric Test Mannequin
item.description: For my Multidisciplinary Senior Design (MSD) project, I worked on a team to develop the sensing system for the “pediatric test mannequin”: an anthromorphic test device for a motorized pediatric stander. The motorized pediatric stander kit was developed by a previous MSD team to enable children with limited mobility to manually control their motion. This test mannequin was designed with the purpose of collecting data to characterize the stander’s performance and the rider’s experience/safety.
